history.subject: Mac OS X下用clang编译lab1代码出错
history.content:
akagi201@akrmbp ~/Downloads/ucore_lab/labcodes/lab1 (master) $ make
***
*** Error: Couldn't find an i386-elf version of GCC/binutils.
*** Is the directory with i386-elf-gcc in your PATH?
*** If your i386-elf toolchain is installed with a command
*** prefix other than 'i386-elf-', set your GCCPREFIX
*** environment variable to that prefix and run 'make' again.
*** To turn off this error, run 'gmake GCCPREFIX= ...'.
***
ld: unknown option: -V
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/boot/bootmain.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/boot/bootasm.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/mm/pmm.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/trap/vectors.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/trap/trapentry.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/trap/trap.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/driver/picirq.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/driver/intr.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/driver/console.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/driver/clock.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/debug/panic.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/debug/kmonitor.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/debug/kdebug.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/libs/stdio.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/libs/readline.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/kern/init/init.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/libs/string.d'
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** Deleting file `obj/libs/printfmt.d'
+ cc kern/init/init.c
clang: error: unsupported option '-gstabs'
make: *** [obj/kern/init/init.o] Error 1
clang-3.5以上版本是可以编译ucore lab的。
clang-3.5以上版本是可以编译ucore lab的。

children.subject:
我的Linux机器中安装了clang-3.5
修改lab1的如下几行试试：
Line8：  USELLVM := 1
Line54-56 ：
HOSTCC		:= clang-3.5
HOSTCFLAGS	:= -g -Wall -O2
CC		:= clang-3.5
然后应该就可以编译了。结果如下：

把 ld -nostdlib 改成 -Z，又有

ld: unknown option: -T
make: *** [bin/kernel] Error 1

还是上虚拟机吧
一模一样的问题，请问有没有解决办法

我没有在MAC上试过。在ubuntu 64bit上的clang-3.5编译ucore是成功的。建议上虚拟机，或者用gcc。
我们第一推荐是linux环境。

按照此链接中的方法编译成功：https://github.com/maojie/pintos_mac/pull/2

brew tap altkatz/homebrew-gcc_cross_compilers
brew install homebrew/versions/gcc49
brew unlink gcc
brew link gcc49
brew install i386-elf-gcc i386-elf-binutils
brew unlink binutils
brew link i386-elf-binutils

但是 make debug 不成功，将 Makefile 中的 TERMINAL :=gnome-terminal 改为 TERMINAL :=xterm，提示：

tools/gdbinit:1: Error in sourced command file:
"/Users/maxz/Workspace/Projects/MOOC/OS/ucore_lab/labcodes_answer/lab1_result/ob
j/bootblock.o": not in executable format: File format not recognized

感觉是 GDB 的问题（我的 GDB 是通过 Homebrew 安装的）
安装 i386-elf-gdb 后可以正常调试

为什么我安装不了i386-elf-gcc？

➜  ~  brew install i386-elf-gcc                  

==> Installing i386-elf-gcc from altkatz/homebrew-gcc_cross_compilers

==> Downloading http://ftpmirror.gnu.org/gcc/gcc-4.9.2/gcc-4.9.2.tar.bz2

Already downloaded: /Library/Caches/Homebrew/i386-elf-gcc-4.9.2.tar.bz2

==> ../configure --disable-nls --target=i386-elf --disable-werror --prefix=/usr/local/Cellar/i386-elf-gcc/4.9.2_1 --enable-languages=c --without-headers

ftp://gcc.gnu.org/pub/gcc/infrastructure/.  See also

http://gcc.gnu.org/install/prerequisites.html for additional info.  If

you obtained GMP, MPFR and/or MPC from a vendor distribution package,

make sure that you have installed both the libraries and the header

files.  They may be located in separate packages.
